show_gradients_help: Display the difference between the parts of the equation. The darker the greater the difference
highlight_lucky_help: Lucky tickets will be marked with red dots
help_1: This is a visualizer of the distribution of lucky tickets.
help_3: Enter the formulas for the left and right parts of the equality that will determine whether the ticket is a lucky ticket or not.
help_4: i.e. first three digits of a ticket number are a, b and c, three last digits - x, y and z. The left three-digit number is denoted by l, right one - r.
help_5: You canuse any operators and functions from math.js.
